title: New: TĀLĀ – Serbia
body:
[TĀLĀ](https://soundcloud.

com/talaofficial)‘s debut track, [The Duchess](www.crackintheroad.com/music/27796-new-tala-duchess/), marked her out as one of 2014’s most important new names, and todays follow up, _Serbia_, is yet another big step up. Soulful and uncompromising in it’s levels of energy; to be honest, it’s one of the finest tracks of the year thus far. Ready for London’s slickest dancefloors, as well as big-time radio play, [TĀLĀ](https://soundcloud.com/talaofficial) is destined to go very, very far. Pre-order the three track EP [here](http://aesoplabel.com/tala-the-duchess/), and check out Serbia below.
